title: The Republican Senate candidate tells Melania Trump that the White House is "sterilized."
subtitle: Carlos Perov, nominated for the United States Senate of Marco Rubio, described President Barack Obama as an "animal" months before Trump won the election.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A candidate for the Republican Senate, Melania Trump, called for the "sterilisation" of the White House after "animals" on vacation.
